name: Rick Astley
description: English singer known for his hit single 'Never Gonna Give You Up'. Most popular between the late 1980s and the early 1990s when he reached the top of the UK charts.

name: Dua Lipa
description: Popular English and Albanian singer, known for her upbeat pop songs.

name: Elton John
description: Critically acclaimed singer during the 1970s. His music shaped the modern music industry and remains popular to this day.

name: Harry Styles
description: Originating from popular boy band 'One Direction', Harry Styles is a successful solo artist who also happens to be a large influencer in pop culture.

name: Adele
description: Known for her incredible vocals, Adele is recognized as a British icon who holds multiple Grammy Awards.

name: Sam Smith
description: English songwriter and singer, rose to popularity relatively recently in the UK.

name: Elvis Costello
description: One of the most popular British rock musicians. His songs are a popular choice amongst modern cover bands.

name: Eric Clapton
description: One of the most influential rock guitarists of all time, consistently ranking within the top 5 guitarists of all time across multiple charts.

name: Ed Sheeran
description: Known for combining folk and pop music, Ed Sheeran is one of the most popular singers among the current generation of teenagers and young adults.

name: Billy Ocean
song: When The Going Gets Tough, The Tough Get Going
description: Trinidadian-British singer, known during the 1970s and 1980s for his soul and pop music.

name: George Michael
description: British pop culture icon, commonly regarded as one of the greatest singers of all time.
